SITE_DESCRIPTION: Monadical is a full-stack software development consultancy. We specialize in full-stack web development and custom software solutions.

property-based-testing-for-temporal-grap.title: Property-Based Testing for Temporal Graph Storage
property-based-testing-for-temporal-grap.description: A motley of functional techniques to allow isomorphic and deterministic graph generation.

from-chaos-to-cohesion.title: From Chaos to Cohesion: Architecting Your Own Monorepo
from-chaos-to-cohesion.description: Build a simple monorepo using GitHub Actions as a CI/CD tool.

morpheus-announcement.title: Morpheus: A Dream Machine for AI Art Generation
morpheus-announcement.description: Giving you the power to create stunning and beautiful generative art.

zulip-ai-bot-2.title: Integrating AI Models into Zulip Chatbots Using FastAPI: Part 2
zulip-ai-bot-2.description: Learn how to use N-tier architecture and FastAPI to build a scalable Zulip bot that can retrieve messages, links, and images from Zulip streams and topics.

minecraft-skins-part2.title: Digging Deeper Into Minecraft Skin Generation
minecraft-skins-part2.description: Learn how to generate custom Minecraft skins from text prompts using a Stable Diffusion model.

mincraft-skin-generation.title: Digging into Stable Diffusion-Generated Minecraft Skins
mincraft-skin-generation.description: Fine-tune a Stable Diffusion model on a Minecraft dataset and create custom Minecraft-style characters using text prompts.

demystifying-databases.title: Demystifying Databases: Cracking the Code of Efficient Data Storage
demystifying-databases.description: Unlock the power of data with comprehensive insights and practical guidance on selecting the ideal database for your projects, from relational databases to cutting-edge blockchain technologies.

fine-tune-or-not-llm-ai-business-transfo.title: To Fine-Tune or Not Fine-Tune: Large Language Models for AI-Driven Business Transformation
fine-tune-or-not-llm-ai-business-transfo.description: Discover the transformative power of LLMs for your business in our comprehensive roadmap, from their origins to the training processes, safety considerations, and current trends.

shades-of-rust-gui-library-list.title: 50 Shades of Rust, or emerging Rust GUIs in a WASM world
shades-of-rust-gui-library-list.description: An overview of Rust GUI libraries and frameworks, focused on WASM. Discover the latest GUI toolkit options for Rust, increase your programming skills, and create efficient WebAssembly bundles that will help you build comprehensive applications.

filters-github-actions.title: Filters with Github Actions
filters-github-actions.description: In this tutorial, you will learn how to implement your version of [skip ci] of GitHub Actions to control when executing a workflow or jobs.

zulip-ia-bot-1.title: Integrating AI models into Zulip bots using FastAPI: Part 1
zulip-ia-bot-1.description: Artificial intelligence is a powerful tool for automating tasks and improving the efficiency of your business. In this series, we'll explore how to integrate AI models into Zulip bots using FastAPI.

strategy-backtracking-using-python-gener.title: A pattern for strategy backtracking using Python generators
strategy-backtracking-using-python-gener.description: While fixing a bug that was affecting an ETL pipeline, we found a clean and simple pattern for strategy backtracking using Python Generators and generator expressions.

minting-nft-solana-mobile.description: React Native is a powerful tool for developing mobile apps that make use of Solana’s mobile wallet adapter. Here’s how to use the tech to mint an NFT.

modular-arithmetic.title: How to build a modular arithmetic library in Python
modular-arithmetic.description: In this tutorial, we're going to learn how to create a library for modular arithmetic, using operator overloading and redefining the built-in functions for NumPy.

ramping-up-solana-phone.title: Ramping up on Solana Phone: Crypto for mobile
ramping-up-solana-phone.description: The upcoming launch of Solana Mobile has a lot of us intrigued! We run you through what this new tech is and how to get set up.

blog-ideas-for-developers.title: How to get blog post ideas as a developer
blog-ideas-for-developers.description: Whenever I hit writer’s block, I explore these four areas. They’ve never failed to help me find ideas for my next article.

python-vs-javascript-dealing-with-the-qu.description: As someone who’s used to implementing asynchronous programming in JS, implementing it in Python came as a surprise. Here’s what I learned.

fastapi-for-functions.description: We make an already-powerful program for plotting mathematical functions even better using three steps.

Doing so will allow Candy Machine users to mint “closed” NFTs and wait for them to be “revealed” at a later date, bringing elements of anticipation and excitement to their experience.

5-paquetes-django.description: Uno de los mayores atractivos de Django es su ecosistema. Si se presenta algún problema existen muchas posibilidades de que alguien en la comunidad también lo haya tenido, y fuera tan amable de abstraerlo en un paquete reutilizable y publicarlo para la comunidad. Aquí encontrará cinco paquetes muy útiles que usamos con

django-packages.title: Five Django Packages We Love at Monadical

how-to-make-remote-work-part-two-zulip.description: How I've learned to be productive working from home. I'll write a second guide about how I think about remote work as a manager and the processes Monadical have put into place to make things work for us.

anatomy-of-html-css-js.description: A basic introduction and glossary for people learning HTML, CSS, and Javascript. Intended for people just getting started with frontend development.

avoiding-dry-for-easier-refactoring.description: A short post about a particularly nice pattern for future refactorers that breaks the Don't-Repeat-Yourself principle commonly taught to beginners.

declarative-animations.description: As systems get more complex, they trend towards expressing more of their complexity as data. Animations can be defined in data too.

intro-to-opt-directory.description: An overview of how we provision and organize code and data on servers using the UNIX /opt directory.

django-operation-queue.description: Everyone wants their writes strictly ordered, if we can represent a list of write operations as a data structure, that gets easier.

redux.description: Storing data in a normalized form allows us to calculate fast indexes for lookups.

segwit.description: Segwit increases total number of bytes for each transaction (very slightly), but changes the way that block size is calculated so that the signatures don’t count as much against the limit.

reconciling.description: The fundamental issue is that Django wants you to build up your pages using template fragments, and React wants to pull you into its world with JS components as the main building blocks.

concurrent.description: When dealing with Django models accessed by multiple people, you want a way to make sure two requests don’t perform writes at the same time.

reduxsharing.description: When writing an app using Redux and React, you may run into the common problem of having to share state between multiple components in your app.

map-of-cs.description: A map of all the subfields encompassed by computer science, with job titles commonly used to hire people in those areas.

downswings.title: Downswings and the Information Game
downswings.description: I often hear players say, “I hate that site. It’s completely rigged. I can never win there.” Perhaps those players simply ran bad at first on that site...
